name: Lighthouse 24/7
description:
LIGHTHOUSE 24/7

It's your turn to man the Lighthouse and prevent any ships or boats from becoming a wreck on the rocks!
Swing your light from left to right and ensure the Captains can see you so they can turn around or change course in order to stop destruction.
How many Lives will be saved by your expert Lighthouse skills?
Amazing and different gameplay will challenge the best and most observant.
Save The Boats!
